comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux x86_64; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101206 Linux Mint/9 (Isadora) Firefox/3.6.13
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; U; Linux x86_64; en-US; rv:1.9.2.13) Gecko/20101206 Linux Mint/9 (Isadora) Firefox/3.6.13

If the page is scrolled using the wheel when a tooltip showing the title= attribute is visible, a grey box is left on the page where the tooltip was

Happens on any page, not just the example page given

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Show page with title= attributes
2.position cursor & wait for tooltip to show
3.scroll with wheel
Actual Results:  
Grey (background colour box left where tool was on the page, this stays there and continues to scroll with the page.

Expected Results:  
No grey box

Will attach screenshot showing the problem on the example page given
comments.creator: elextr@gmail.com
comments.author: elextr@gmail.com
